feat.name: Aberrant Dragonmark
entries: You have manifested an aberrant dragonmark. Determine its appearance and the flaw associated with it. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You learn a {@filter cantrip of your choice from the sorcerer spell list|spells|level=0|class=Sorcerer}. In addition, choose a {@filter 1st-level spell from the sorcerer spell list|spells|level=1|class=Sorcerer}. You learn that spell and can cast it through your mark. Once you cast it, you must finish a short or long rest before you can cast it again through the mark. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Constitució.

When you cast the 1st-level spell through your mark, you can expend one of your Hit Dice and roll it. If you roll an even number, you gain a number of temporary hit points equal to the number rolled. If you roll an odd number, one random creature within 30 feet of you (not including you) takes force damage equal to the number rolled. If no other creatures are in range, you take the damage.

entries: You also develop a random flaw from the Aberrant Dragonmark Flaws table.

entries.caption: Aberrant Dragonmark Flaws
rows: Your mark is a source of constant physical pain.
Your mark whispers to you. Its meaning can be unclear.
When you're stressed, the mark hisses audibly.
The skin around the mark is burned, scaly, or withered.
You have a mood swing any time you use your mark.
Your looks change slightly whenever you use the mark.
You have horrific nightmares after you use your mark.

entries.name: Option: Greater Aberrant Powers
entries: At the DM's option, a character who has the Aberrant Dragonmark feat has a chance of manifesting greater power. Upon reaching 10th level, such a character has a {@chance 10|10 percent} chance of gaining an {@filter epic boon|rewards|type=boon} from among the options in chapter 7 of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}. If the character fails to gain a boon, they have a {@chance 10|10 percent} chance the next time they gain a level.

If the character gains a boon, the DM chooses it or determines it randomly. The character also permanently loses one of their Hit Dice, and their punts de vida màxims is reduced by an amount equal to a roll of that die plus their Constitució modifier (minimum reduction of 1). This reduction can't be reversed by any means.

feat.name: Acrobat
entries: You become more nimble, gaining the following benefits:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Acrobatics}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
Com a acció bonus, you can make una tirada de Destresa ({@skill Acrobàcies}) amb CD 15. If you succeed, terreny difícil doesn't cost you extra movement until the end of the current turn.

feat.name: Actor
entries: Skilled at mimicry and dramatics, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You have advantage on Carisma ({@skill Engany}) and Carisma ({@skill Persuasió}) checks when trying to pass yourself off as a different person.

You can mimic the speech of another person or the sounds made by other creatures. You must have heard the person speaking, or heard the creature make the sound, for at least 1 minute. A successful Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) check contested by your Carisma ({@skill Engany}) check allows a listener to determine that the effect is faked.

feat.name: Alchemist
entries: You have studied the secrets of alchemy and are an expert in its practice, gaining the following benefits:

items: Tens competència amb {@item alchemist's supplies|phb}. If you are already proficient with them, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with them.
Com a acció, you can identify one potion within 5 feet of you, as if you had tasted it. You must see the liquid for this benefit to work.

Over the course of any short rest, you can temporarily improve the potency of one potion of healing of any rarity. To use this benefit, you must have {@item alchemist's supplies|phb} with you, and the potion must be within reach. If the potion is drunk no more than 1 hour after the short rest ends, the creature drinking the potion can forgo the potion's die roll and regains the maximum number of hit points that the potion can restore.

feat.name: Alert
entries: Always on the lookout for danger, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You gain a +5 bonus to initiative.
You can't be surprised while you are conscious.
Other creatures don't gain advantage on attack rolls against you as a result of being unseen by you.

feat.name: Animal Handler
entries: You master the techniques needed to train and handle animals. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Animal Handling}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

Pots, com a acció bonus, on your turn to command one friendly beast within 60 feet of you that can hear you and that isn't currently following the command of someone else. You decide now what action the beast will take and where it will move during its next turn, or you issue a general command that lasts for 1 minute, such as to guard a particular area.

feat.name: Arcanist
entries: You study the arcane arts, gaining the following benefits:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Arcana}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

You learn the {@spell prestidigitació} and {@spell detectar màgia} spells. You can cast detectar màgia once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Artificer Initiate
entries: You've learned some of an artificer's inventiveness:

items: You learn one cantrip of your choice from the {@filter artificer spell list|spells|level=0;1|class=artificer}, and you learn one 1st-level spell of your choice from {@filter that list|spells|level=0;1|class=artificer}. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència.
You can cast this feat's 1st-level spell without a spell slot, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast it in this way again. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have.

Tens competència amb unes type of {@filter artisan's tools|items|type=artisan's tools} of your choice, and you can use that type of tool as a spellcasting focus for any spell you cast that uses Intel·ligència as its habilitat de llançament de conjurs.

feat.name: Artificer Initiate
entries: You've learned some of an artificer's inventiveness, granting you the following benefits:

items: You learn one cantrip of your choice from the {@filter artificer spell list|spells|level=0;1|class=artificer}, and you learn one 1st-level spell of your choice from {@filter that list|spells|level=0;1|class=artificer}. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència. Whenever you gain a level, you can replace one of these spells with another spell of the same level from the artificer spell list.
You can cast this feat's 1st-level spell without a spell slot, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast it in this way again. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have.

Tens competència amb unes type of {@filter artisan's tools|items|type=artisan's tools} of your choice, and you can use that type of tool as a spellcasting focus for any spell you cast that uses Intel·ligència as its habilitat de llançament de conjurs

feat.name: Athlete
entries: You have undergone extensive physical training to gain the following benefits:

items: When you are {@condition enderrocat}, standing up uses only 5 feet of your movement.
Climbing doesn't cost you extra movement.
You can make a running long jump or a running high jump after moving only 5 feet on foot, rather than 10 feet.

feat.name: Barbed Hide
entries: One of your ancestors was a barbed devil or other spiky fiend. Barbs protrude from your head. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Com a acció bonus, you can cause small barbs to protrude all over your body or cause them to retract. A l'inici de cada torn teu while the barbs are out, you deal {@damage 1d6} de dany perforant to any creature grappling you or any creature {@condition grappled} by you.
Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Intimidation}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

feat.name: Blade Mastery
entries: You master the {@item shortsword|phb}, {@item longsword|phb}, {@item simitarra|phb}, {@item rapier|phb}, i {@item espasa gran|phb}. Obténs els beneficis següents when using any of them:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls you make with the weapon.

On your turn, you can use your reaction to assume a parrying stance, provided you have the weapon in hand. Doing so grants you a +1 bonus to your AC fins el final del teu proper torn or until you're not holding the weapon.
When you make an opportunity attack with the weapon, you have advantage on the attack roll.

feat.name: Bountiful Luck
entries: Whenever an ally que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast rolls a 1 on the {@dice d20} for an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can use your reaction to let the ally reroll the die. The ally must use the new roll.

feat.name: Bountiful Luck
entries: Your people have extraordinary luck, which you have learned to mystically lend to your companions when you see them falter. You're not sure how you do it; you just wish it, and it happens. Surely a sign of fortune's favor!

When an ally que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast rolls a 1 on the {@dice d20} for an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can use your reaction to let the ally reroll the die. The ally must use the new roll.
When you use this ability, you can't use your Lucky racial trait before the end of your next turn.

feat.name: Brawny
entries: You become stronger, gaining the following benefits:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Athletics}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
You count as if you were one size larger for the purpose of determining your carrying capacity.

feat.name: Burglar
entries: You pride yourself on your quickness and your close study of certain clandestine activities. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència amb {@item thieves' tools|phb}. If you are already proficient with them, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with them.

feat.name: Charger
entries: When you use your action to {@action Dash}, pots, com a acció bonus, make one atac armat cos a cos or to {@action shove} a creature.

If you move at least 10 feet in a straight line immediately before taking this bonus action, you either gain a +5 bonus to the attack's damage roll (if you chose to make a melee attack and hit) or push the target up to 10 feet away from you (if you chose to shove and you succeed).

feat.name: Chef
entries: Time spent mastering the culinary arts has paid off, granting you the following benefits:

items: Tens competència amb {@item cook's utensils|phb} if you don't already have it.

As part of a short rest, you can cook special food, provided you have ingredients and {@item cook's utensils|phb} on hand. You can prepare enough of this food for a number of creatures equal to 4 + your proficiency bonus. At the end of the short rest, any creature who eats the food and spends one or more Hit Dice to regain hit points regains an extra {@dice 1d8} hit points.

With one hour of work or when you finish a long rest, you can cook a number of treats equal to your proficiency bonus. These special treats last 8 hours after being made. A creature can use a bonus action to eat one of those treats to gain temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus.

feat.name: Chef
entries: Time and effort spent mastering the culinary arts has paid off. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència amb {@item cook's utensils|phb} if you don't already have it.

As part of a short rest, you can cook special food, provided you have ingredients and {@item cook's utensils|phb} on hand. You can prepare enough of this food for a number of creatures equal to 4 + your proficiency bonus. At the end of the short rest, any creature who eats the food and spends one or more Hit Dice to regain hit points regains an extra {@dice 1d8} hit points.

With one hour of work or when you finish a long rest, you can cook a number of treats equal to your proficiency bonus. These special treats last 8 hours after being made. A creature can use a bonus action to eat one of those treats to gain temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus.

feat.name: Critter Friend
entries: Your friendship with animals mystically deepens. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Animal Handling}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

You learn the {@spell parlar animal} spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. You also learn the {@spell amistat animal} spell, and you can cast it once with this feat, without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a long rest. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència.

feat.name: Crossbow Expert
entries: Thanks to extensive practice with the crossbow, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You ignore the loading quality of crossbows with which you are proficient.
Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls.
When you use the {@action Attack} action and attack with a one-handed weapon, pots, com a acció bonus, attack with a {@item hand crossbow|phb} you are holding.

feat.name: Crusher
entries: You are practiced in the art of crushing your enemies, granting you the following benefits:

items: Un cop per torn, when you hit a creature with an attack that deals dany contundent, you can move it 5 feet to an unoccupied space, provided the target is no more than one size larger than you.
When you score a critical hit that deals dany contundent to a creature, attack rolls against that creature are made with advantage fins el final del teu proper torn.

feat.name: Crusher
entries: You are practiced in the art of crushing your enemies, granting you the following benefits:

items: Un cop per torn, when you hit a creature with an attack that deals dany contundent, you can move it 5 feet to an unoccupied space, provided the target is no more than one size larger than you.
When you score a critical hit that deals dany contundent to a creature, attack rolls against that creature are made with advantage until the end of your next turn.

feat.name: Defensive Duelist
entries: When you are wielding a finesse weapon with which you are proficient and another creature hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to add your proficiency bonus to your AC for that attack, potentially causing the attack to miss you.

feat.name: Diplomat
entries: You master the arts of diplomacy, gaining the following benefits:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Persuasion}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

If you spend 1 minute talking to someone who can understand what you say, you can make una tirada de Carisma ({@skill Persuasion}) contested by the creature's Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) check. If you or your companions are fighting the creature, your check automatically fails. If your check succeeds, the target is {@condition fascinat} by you as long as it remains within 60 feet of you and for 1 minute thereafter.

feat.name: Dragon Temor
entries: When angered, you radiate menace. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Instead of exhaling destructive energy, you can roar and expend a use of your breath weapon to force each creature of your choice within 30 feet of you salvar per Saviesa (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + el teu modificador de Carisma). A target automatically succeeds if it can't hear or see you. Si falla, a target becomes {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. If the {@condition acovardit} target takes any damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

feat.name: Dragon Temor
entries: When angered, you radiate menace. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Instead of exhaling destructive energy, you can expend a use of your Breath Weapon trait to roar, forcing each creature of your choice within 30 feet of you salvar per Saviesa (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + el teu modificador de Carisma). A target automatically succeeds on the save if it can't hear or see you. Si falla, a target becomes {@condition acovardit} of you durant 1 minut. If the {@condition acovardit} target takes any damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

feat.name: Dragon Hide
entries: You inherited the might and majesty of your dragon ancestors. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You grow retractable claws from the tips of your fingers. Extending or retracting the claws requires no action. The claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make atacs desarmats. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to {@dice 1d4} + el teu modificador de Força, instead of the dany contundent normal for an atac desarmat.
Your scales harden; you gain a +1 bonus to AC while you aren't wearing armor.

feat.name: Dragon Hide
entries: You manifest scales and claws reminiscent of your draconic ancestors. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Your scales harden. While you aren't wearing armor, you can calculate your AC as 13 + el teu modificador de Destresa. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

You grow retractable claws from the tips of your fingers. Extending or retracting the claws requires no action. The claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make atacs desarmats. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to {@dice 1d4} + el teu modificador de Força, instead of the normal dany contundent for an atac desarmat.

feat.name: Dragon Wings
entries: You sprout draconic wings. With your wings, tens una velocitat de vol de 20 peus if you aren't wearing heavy armor and aren't exceeding your carrying capacity.

feat.name: Dragonmark of Detection
entries: Your have the magical mark of Detection, the dragonmark of House Medani, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Saviesa as your habilitat de llançament de conjurs. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell detectar màgia}, {@spell mà de mag}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell detectar pensaments}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell clarividència}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Finding

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Saviesa as your habilitat de llançament de conjurs. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Intel·ligència as your habilitat de llançament de conjurs. You cast each spell at its lowest level.
