entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell cercle màgic}

feat.name: Drow High Magic
entries: You learn more of the spells typical for your people. You learn {@spell detectar màgia} and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. You also learn {@spell levitar} and {@spell dissipar màgia}, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast the spell in this way when you finish a long rest. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

feat.name: Drow High Magic
entries: You learn more of the magic typical of dark elves. You learn the {@spell detectar màgia} spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. You also learn {@spell levitar} and {@spell dissipar màgia}, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast those two spells in this way when you finish a long rest. Carisma is your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for all three spells.

feat.name: Dual Wielder
entries: You master fighting with two weapons, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to AC while you are wielding a separate melee weapon in each hand.
You can use two-weapon fighting even when the one-handed melee weapons you are wielding aren't light.
You can draw or stow two one-handed weapons when you would normally be able to draw or stow only one.

feat.name: Dungeon Delver
entries: Alert to the hidden traps and secret doors found in many dungeons, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You have advantage on Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) and Intel·ligència ({@skill Investigació}) checks made to detect the presence of secret doors.
You have advantage on saving throws made to avoid or resist traps.
Tens resistència al dany the dealt by traps.
Traveling at a fast pace doesn't impose the normal -5 penalty on your passive Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) score.

feat.name: Durable
entries: Hardy and resilient, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: When you roll a Hit Die to regain hit points, the minimum number of hit points you regain from the roll equals twice your Constitució modifier (minimum of 2).

feat.name: Dwarf Resilience
entries: You have the blood of dwarf heroes flowing through your veins. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Whenever you take the {@action Dodge} action in combat, you can spend one Hit Die to heal yourself. Roll the die, add your Constitució modifier, and regain a number of hit points equal to the total (minimum of 1).

feat.name: Dwarven Fortitude
entries: You have the blood of dwarf heroes flowing through your veins. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Whenever you take the {@action Dodge} action in combat, you can spend one Hit Die to heal yourself. Roll the die, add your Constitució modifier, and regain a number of hit points equal to the total (minimum of 1).

feat.name: Eldritch Adept
entries: Studying occult lore, you have unlocked eldritch power within yourself: you learn one {@filter Eldritch Invocation|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=EI} option of your choice from the warlock class. If the invocation has a prerequisite of any kind, you can choose that invocation only if you're a warlock who meets the prerequisite.
Whenever you gain a level, you can replace the invocation with another one from the warlock class.

feat.name: Eldritch Adept
entries: Studying occult lore, you have unlocked eldritch power within yourself: you learn one {@filter Eldritch Invocation|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=EI} option of your choice from the warlock class. If the invocation has a prerequisite, you can choose that invocation only if you're a warlock and only if you meet the prerequisite.
Whenever you gain a level, you can replace the invocation with another one from the warlock class.

feat.name: Elemental Adept
entries: When you gain this feat, choose one of the following damage types: àcid, elèctric, foc, fred, o tro.
Spells you cast ignore resistance to dany del tipus escollit. In addition, when you roll damage for a spell you cast that deals damage of that type, you can treat any 1 on a damage die as a 2.
You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you do so, you must choose a different damage type.

feat.name: Elven Accuracy
entries: You have uncanny aim. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Whenever you have advantage on an attack roll, you can reroll one of the dice once.

feat.name: Elven Accuracy
entries: The accuracy of elves is legendary, especially that of elf archers and spellcasters. You have uncanny aim with attacks that rely on precision rather than brute force. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Whenever you have advantage on an attack roll using Destresa, Intel·ligència, Saviesa, or Carisma, you can reroll one of the dice once.

feat.name: Empathic
entries: You possess keen insight into how other people think and feel. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Insight}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

Pots, com a acció, try to get uncanny insight about one humanoid que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. Make una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) contested by the target's Carisma ({@skill Engany}) check. If your check succeeds, you have advantage on attack rolls and ability checks against the target until the end of your next turn.

feat.name: Everybody's Friend
entries: You develop your magnetic personality to ease your way through the world. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Deception} and {@skill Persuasion} skills. If you're already proficient in either skill, your proficiency bonus is doubled for any check you make with that skill.

feat.name: Fade Away
entries: You can draw on your magical heritage to escape danger. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: When you take damage, pots, com a reacció, magically become {@condition invisible} until the end of your next turn or until you attack, deal damage, or force someone to make a saving throw. Once you use this ability, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: Fade Away
entries: Your people are clever, with a knack for illusion magic. You have learned a magical trick for fading away when you suffer harm. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Immediately after you take damage, pots, com a reacció, magically become {@condition invisible} until the end of your next turn or until you attack, deal damage, or force someone to make a saving throw. Once you use this ability, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: Fell Handed
entries: You master the {@item handaxe|phb}, {@item battleaxe|phb}, {@item greataxe|phb}, {@item warhammer|phb}, i {@item maul|phb}. Obténs els beneficis següents when using any of them:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls you make with the weapon.

Whenever you have advantage on a melee attack roll you make with the weapon and hit, you can knock the target {@condition enderrocat} if the lower of the two {@dice d20} rolls would also hit the target.

Whenever you have disadvantage on a melee attack roll you make with the weapon, the target takes dany contundent equal to your Força modifier (minimum of 0) if the attack misses but the higher of the two {@dice d20} rolls would have hit.

If you use the {@action Help} action to aid an ally's melee attack while you're wielding the weapon, you knock the target's shield aside momentarily. In addition to the ally gaining advantage on the attack roll, the ally gains a +2 bonus to the roll if the target is using a shield.

feat.name: Fey Teleportation
entries: Drawing on your fey ancestry, you have learned how to teleport. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You learn the {@spell pas boira} spell and can cast it once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a short or long rest. Intel·ligència is your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for this spell.

feat.name: Fey Teleportation
entries: Your study of high elven lore has unlocked fey power that few other elves possess, except your eladrin cousins. Drawing on your fey ancestry, you can momentarily stride through the Terra Fata to shorten your path from one place to another. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You learn to speak, read, and write {@language Silvà}.

You learn the {@spell pas boira} spell and can cast it once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a short or long rest. Intel·ligència is your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for this spell.

feat.name: Fey Touched
entries: Your exposure to the Terra Fata's magic has changed you, granting you the following benefits:

items: You learn the {@spell pas boira} spell and one {@filter 1st-level spell|spells|level=1|school=E;D} of your choice. The 1st-level spell must be from the divination or enchantment school of magic. You can cast each of these spells without expending a spell slot. Once you cast either of these spells in this way, you can't cast that spell in this way again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spells' habilitat de llançament de conjurs is the ability increased by this feat.

feat.name: Fey Touched
entries: Your exposure to the Terra Fata or one of its denizens has left a magical mark on you. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You learn the {@spell pas boira} spell and one {@filter 1st-level spell|spells|level=1|school=E;D} of your choice. The 1st-level spell must be from the divination or enchantment school of magic. You can cast each of these spells without expending a spell slot. Once you cast either of these spells in this way, you can't cast that spell in this way again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spells' habilitat de llançament de conjurs is the ability increased by this feat.

feat.name: Fighting Initiate
entries: Your martial training has helped you develop a particular style of fighting. As a result, you learn one {@filter Fighting Style|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=FS:F} option of your choice from the fighter class. If you already have a style, the one you choose must be different.
Whenever you reach a level that grants the Ability Score Improvement feature, you can replace this feat's fighting style with another one from the fighter class that you don't have.

feat.name: Fighting Initiate
entries: Your martial training has helped you develop a particular style of fighting. As a result, you learn one {@filter Fighting Style|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=FS:F} option of your choice from the fighter class. If you already have a style, the one you choose must be different.
Whenever you gain a level, you can replace this feat's fighting style with another one from the fighter class that you don't have.

feat.name: Flail Mastery
entries: The {@item flail|phb} is a tricky weapon to use, but you have spent countless hours mastering it. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls you make with a flail.

Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can prepare yourself to extend your flail to sweep over targets' {@item shield|phb|shields}. Until the end of this turn, your attack rolls with a flail gain a +2 bonus against any target using a {@item shield|phb}.
When you hit with an opportunity attack using a flail, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + el teu modificador de Força) or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

feat.name: Flames of Phlegethos
entries: You learn to call on hellfire to serve your commands. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: When you roll fire damage for a spell you cast, you can reroll any roll of 1 on the fire damage dice, but you must use the new roll, even if it is another 1.

Whenever you cast a spell that deals fire damage, you can cause flames to wreathe you until the end of your next turn. The flames don't harm you or your possessions, and they shed bright light out to 30 feet and dim light for an additional 30 feet. While the flames are present, any creature within 5 feet of you that hits you with a melee attack rep {@damage 1d4} de dany de foc.

feat.name: Flames of Phlegethos
entries: You learn to call on hellfire to serve your commands. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: When you roll fire damage for a spell you cast, you can reroll any roll of 1 on the fire damage dice, but you must use the new roll, even if it is another 1.

Whenever you cast a spell that deals fire damage, you can cause flames to wreathe you until the end of your next turn. The flames don't harm you or your possessions, and they shed bright light out to 30 feet and dim light for an additional 30 feet. While the flames are present, any creature within 5 feet of you that hits you with a melee attack rep {@damage 1d4} de dany de foc.

feat.name: Gift of the Chromatic Dragon
entries: You've manifested some of the power of chromatic dragons, granting you the following benefits:

items: Com a acció bonus, you can touch a simple or martial weapon and infuse it with one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. For the next minute, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 1d4} dany del tipus escollit when it hits. After you use this ability, no pots tornar a emprar-lo fins que acabis un descans llarg.

When you take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage, you can use your reaction to give yourself resistance to that instance of damage. You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabes un descans llarg.

feat.name: Gift of the Gem Dragon
entries: You've manifested some of the power of gem dragons, granting you the following benefits:

items: When you take damage from a creature that is within 10 feet of you, you can use your reaction to emanate telekinetic energy. The creature that dealt damage to you must succeed on a Força saving throw (DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier of the score increased by this feat) or take {@dice 2d8} de dany de força and be pushed 10 feet away from you. You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabes un descans llarg.

feat.name: Gift of the Metallic Dragon
entries: You've manifested some of the power of metallic dragons, granting you the following benefits:

items: You learn the {@spell curar ferides} spell. You can cast this spell without expending a spell slot. Once you cast this spell in this way, no pots tornar a emprar-lo fins que acabis un descans llarg. You can also cast this spell using spell slots you have. The spell's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència, Saviesa, or Carisma when you cast it with this feat (choose when you gain this feat).

You can manifest protective wings that can shield you or others from attacks. When you or another creature que puguis veure a 5 peus d'abast is hit by an attack roll, you can use your reaction to manifest spectral wings from your back for a moment. Roll a {@dice d4} and grant a bonus to the target's AC equal to the number rolled against that attack roll, potentially causing it to miss. You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabes un descans llarg.

feat.name: Gourmand
entries: You have mastered a variety of special recipes, allowing you to prepare exotic dishes with useful effects. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència amb {@item cook's utensils|phb}. If you are already proficient with them, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with them.
Com a acció, you can inspect a drink or plate of food within 5 feet of you and determine whether it is {@condition emmetzinat}, provided that you can see and smell it.

During a long rest, you can prepare and serve a meal that helps you and your allies recover from the rigors of adventuring, provided you have suitable food, {@item cook's utensils|phb}, and other supplies on hand. The meal serves up to six people, and each person who eats it regains two additional Hit Dice at the end of the long rest. In addition, those who partake of the meal have advantage on Constitució saving throws against disease for the next 24 hours.

feat.name: Grappler
entries: You've developed the skills necessary to hold your own in close-quarters grappling. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You have advantage on attack rolls against a creature you are grappling.

Pots, com a acció, try to pin a creature {@condition grappled} by you. To do so, make another grapple check. If you succeed, you and the creature are both {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends.

feat.name: Great Weapon Master
entries: You've learned to put the weight of a weapon to your advantage, letting its momentum empower your strikes. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: On your turn, when you score a critical hit with a melee weapon or reduce a creature to 0 hit points with one, you can make one atac armat cos a cos as a bonus action.
Before you make a melee attack with a heavy weapon that you are proficient with, you can choose to take a -5 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, you add +10 to the attack's damage.

feat.name: Grudge-Bearer
entries: You have a deep hatred for a particular kind of creature. Choose your foes, a type of creature to bear the burden of your wrath: aberrations, beasts, celestials, constructs, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, giants, monstrosities, oozes, plants, or undead. Alternatively, you can choose two races of humanoid (such as gnolls and orcs). Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: During the first round of any combat against your chosen foes, your attack rolls against any of them have advantage.
When any of your chosen foes makes an opportunity attack against you, it makes the attack roll with disadvantage.

Whenever you make an Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Nature}, o {@skill Religion}) check to recall information about your chosen foes, you add double your proficiency bonus to the check, even if you're not normally proficient.

feat.name: Gunner
entries: You have a quick hand and keen eye when employing firearms, granting you the following benefits:

items: Tens competència amb firearms (see "{@variantrule Firearms|DMG}" in the Dungeon Master's Guide).
You ignore the loading property of firearms.
Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls.

feat.name: Gunner
entries: You have a quick hand and keen eye when employing firearms, granting you the following benefits:

items: Tens competència amb firearms (see "{@variantrule Firearms|DMG}" in the Dungeon Master's Guide).
You ignore the loading property of firearms.
Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls.

feat.name: Healer
entries: You are an able physician, allowing you to mend wounds quickly and get your allies back in the fight. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: When you use a {@item healer's kit|phb} to stabilize a dying creature, that creature also regains 1 hit point.

Com a acció, you can spend one use of a {@item healer's kit|phb} to tend to a creature and restore {@dice 1d6 + 4} hit points to it, plus additional hit points equal to the creature's maximum number of Hit Dice. The creature can't regain hit points from this feat again until it finishes a short or long rest.

feat.name: Heavily Armored
entries: You have trained to master the use of heavy armor, gaining the following benefits:

items: Tens competència amb heavy armor.

feat.name: Heavy Armor Master
entries: You can use your armor to deflect strikes that would kill others. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: While you are wearing heavy armor, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage that you take from nonmagical weapons is reduced by 3.

feat.name: Historian
entries: Your study of history rewards you with the following benefits:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill History}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

When you take the {@action Help} action to aid another creature's ability check, you can make una tirada de Intel·ligència ({@skill Història}) amb CD 15. On a success, that creature's check gains a bonus equal to your proficiency bonus, as you share pertinent advice and historical examples. To receive this bonus, the creature must be able to understand what you're saying.

feat.name: Human Determination
entries: You are filled with a determination that can draw the unreachable within your reach. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: When you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can do so with advantage. Un cop empris aquesta dot, has d'acabar un Descans Curt o bé Llarg per a tornar a emprar-lo.

feat.name: Infernal Constitució
entries: Fiendish blood runs strong in you. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens resistència al dany cold and poison.
You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition emmetzinat}.

feat.name: Infernal Constitució
entries: Fiendish blood runs strong in you, unlocking a resilience akin to that possessed by some fiends. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens resistència al dany cold and poison.
You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition emmetzinat}.

feat.name: Inspiring Leader
entries: You can spend 10 minutes inspiring your companions, shoring up their resolve to fight. When you do so, choose up to six friendly creatures (which can include yourself) within 30 feet of you who can see or hear you and who can understand you. Each creature can gain temporary hit points equal to your level + el teu modificador de Carisma. A creature can't gain temporary hit points from this feat again until it has finished a short or long rest.

feat.name: Investigator
entries: You have an eye for detail and can pick out the smallest clues. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Investigation}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
You can take the {@action Search} action as a bonus action.

feat.name: Keen Mind
entries: You have a mind that can track time, direction, and detail with uncanny precision. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You always know which way is north.
You always know the number of hours left before the next sunrise or sunset.
You can accurately recall anything you have seen or heard within the past month.

feat.name: Lightly Armored
entries: You have trained to master the use of light armor, gaining the following benefits:

items: Tens competència amb light armor.

feat.name: Linguist
entries: You have studied languages and codes, gaining the following benefits:

items: You learn three languages of your choice.

You can ably create written ciphers. Others can't decipher a code you create unless you teach them, they succeed on an Intel·ligència check (DC equal to your Intel·ligència score + your proficiency bonus), or they use magic to decipher it.

feat.name: Lucky
entries: You have inexplicable luck that seems to kick in at just the right moment.

You have 3 luck points. Whenever you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can spend one luck point to roll an additional {@dice d20}. You can choose to spend one of your luck points after you roll the die, but before the outcome is determined. You choose which of the {@dice d20}s is used for the attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

You can also spend one luck point when an attack roll is made against you. Roll a {@dice d20}, and then choose whether the attack uses the attacker's roll or yours. If more than one creature spends a luck point to influence the outcome of a roll, the points cancel each other out; no additional dice are rolled.
You regain your expended luck points when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Mage Slayer
entries: You have practiced techniques useful in melee combat against spellcasters, gaining the following benefits:

items: When a creature within 5 feet of you casts a spell, you can use your reaction to make a atac armat cos a cos against that creature.
When you damage a creature that is concentrating on a spell, that creature has disadvantage on the saving throw it makes to maintain its concentration.
You have advantage on saving throws against spells cast by creatures within 5 feet of you.

feat.name: Magic Initiate
entries: Choose a class: {@filter bard|spells|level=0;1|class=bard}, {@filter cleric|spells|level=0;1|class=cleric}, {@filter druid|spells|level=0;1|class=druid}, {@filter sorcerer|spells|level=0;1|class=sorcerer}, {@filter warlock|spells|level=0;1|class=warlock}, o {@filter wizard|spells|level=0;1|class=wizard}. You learn two cantrips of your choice from that class's spell list.

In addition, choose one 1st-level spell from that same list. You learn that spell and can cast it at its lowest level. Once you cast it, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it again using this feat.

Your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for these spells depends on the class you chose: Carisma for {@filter bard|spells|level=0;1|class=bard}, {@filter sorcerer|spells|level=0;1|class=sorcerer}, o {@filter warlock|spells|level=0;1|class=warlock}; Saviesa for {@filter cleric|spells|level=0;1|class=cleric} or {@filter druid|spells|level=0;1|class=druid}; or Intel·ligència for {@filter wizard|spells|level=0;1|class=wizard}.

feat.name: Martial Adept
entries: You have martial training that allows you to perform special combat maneuvers. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You learn two {@filter maneuvers|optionalfeatures|feature type=MV:B} of your choice from among those available to the {@class fighter|phb|Battle Master|Battle Master|phb|2-0} archetype in the fighter class. If a maneuver you use requires your target to make a saving throw to resist the maneuver's effects, the saving throw DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Força or Destresa modifier (your choice).

You gain one superiority die, which is a {@dice d6} (this die is added to any superiority dice you have from another source). This die is used to fuel your maneuvers. A superiority die is expended when you use it. You regain your expended superiority dice when you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: Master of Disguise
entries: You have honed your ability to shape your personality and to read the personalities of others. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència amb the {@item disguise kit|phb}. If you are already proficient with it, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

If you spend 1 hour observing a creature, you can then spend 8 hours crafting a disguise you can quickly don to mimic that creature. Making the disguise requires a {@item disguise kit|PHB}. You must make checks as normal to disguise yourself, but you can assume the disguise as an action.

feat.name: Medic
entries: You master the physician's arts, gaining the following benefits:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Medicine}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

During a short rest, you can clean and bind the wounds of up to six willing beasts and humanoids. Make una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Medicina}) amb CD 15 for each creature. On a success, if a creature spends a Hit Die during this rest, that creature can forgo the roll and instead regain the maximum number of hit points the die can restore. A creature can do so only once per rest, regardless of how many Hit Dice it spends.

feat.name: Medium Armor Master
entries: You have practiced moving in medium armor to gain the following benefits:

items: Wearing medium armor doesn't impose disadvantage on your Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks.
When you wear medium armor, you can add 3, rather than 2, to your AC if you have a Destresa of 16 or higher.

feat.name: Amenaçant
entries: You become fearsome to others, gaining the following benefits:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Intimidation}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

Quan prens l'acció {@action Attack} on your turn, you can replace one attack with an attempt to demoralize one humanoid que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast that can see and hear you. Make una tirada de Carisma ({@skill Intimidació}) contested by the target's Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) check. If your check succeeds, the target is {@condition acovardit} until the end of your next turn. If your check fails, the target can't be {@condition acovardit} by you in this way for 1 hour.

feat.name: Metabolic Control
entries: You have refined psionic control over your body's functions.

items: If your Psionic Talent die is available, you can take an action to channel your psionic power to nourish yourself for the next 24 hours, as if you consumed sufficient food and water for a day. When you take this action, your Psionic Talent die decreases by one die size.

If your Psionic Talent die is available, you can meditate for 1 minute, at the end of which you gain the benefits of finishing a short rest, and your Psionic Talent die decreases by one die size. You can't meditate in this way again until you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Metamagic Adept
entries: You've learned how to exert your will on your spells to alter how they function:

items: You learn two {@filter Metamagic|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=MM} options of your choice from the sorcerer class. You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it, unless the option says otherwise. Whenever you reach a level that grants the Ability Score Improvement feature, you can replace one of these Metamagic options with another one from the sorcerer class.

You gain 2 sorcery points to spend on Metamagic (these points are added to any sorcery points you have from another source but can be used only on Metamagic). You regain all spent sorcery points when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Metamagic Adept
entries: You've learned how to exert your will on your spells to alter how they function. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You learn two {@filter Metamagic|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=MM} options of your choice from the sorcerer class. You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it, unless the option says otherwise. Whenever you gain a level, you can replace one of your Metamagic options with another one from the sorcerer class.

You gain 2 sorcery points to spend on Metamagic (these points are added to any sorcery points you have from another source but can be used only on Metamagic). You regain all spent sorcery points when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Mobile
entries: You are exceptionally speedy and agile. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Your speed increases by 10 feet.
When you use the {@action Dash} action, terreny difícil doesn't cost you extra movement on that turn.
When you make a melee attack against a creature, you don't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn, whether you hit or not.

feat.name: Moderately Armored
entries: You have trained to master the use of medium armor and shields, gaining the following benefits:

items: Tens competència amb medium armor and shields.

feat.name: Mounted Combatant
entries: You are a dangerous foe to face while mounted. While you are mounted and aren't {@condition incapacitat}, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You have advantage on melee attack rolls against any unmounted creature that is smaller than your mount.
You can force an attack targeted at your mount to target you instead.
If your mount is subjected to an effect that allows it salvar per Destresa to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

feat.name: Naturalist
entries: Your extensive study of nature rewards you with the following benefits:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Nature}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

You learn the {@spell arts de druida} and {@spell detectar malalties i metzines} spells. You can cast {@spell detectar malalties i metzines} once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Observant
entries: Quick to notice details of your environment, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: If you can see a creature's mouth while it is speaking a language you understand, you can interpret what it's saying by reading its lips.
You have a +5 bonus to your passive Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) and passive Intel·ligència ({@skill Investigació}) scores.

feat.name: Orcish Aggression
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

feat.name: Orcish Fury
entries: Your fury burns tirelessly. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: When you hit with an attack made with a simple or martial weapon, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice an additional time and add it as extra damage of the weapon's damage type. Un cop empris aquesta dot, has d'acabar un Descans Curt o bé Llarg per a tornar a emprar-lo.
Immediately after you use your Relentless Endurance trait, you can use your reaction to make one weapon attack.

feat.name: Orcish Fury
entries: Your fury burns tirelessly. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: When you hit with an attack using a simple or martial weapon, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice an additional time and add it as extra damage of the weapon's damage type. Un cop empris aquesta dot, has d'acabar un Descans Curt o bé Llarg per a tornar a emprar-lo.
Immediately after you use your Relentless Endurance trait, you can use your reaction to make one weapon attack.

feat.name: Perceptive
entries: You hone your senses until they become razor sharp. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Perception}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
Being in a lightly obscured area doesn't impose disadvantage on your Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks if you can both see and hear.

feat.name: Performer
entries: You master performance so that you can command any stage. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Performance}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

While performing, you can try to distract one humanoid you can see who can see and hear you. Make una tirada de Carisma ({@skill Persuasió}) contested by the humanoid's Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) check. If your check succeeds, you grab the humanoid's attention enough that it makes Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) and Intel·ligència ({@skill Investigació}) checks with disadvantage until you stop performing.

feat.name: Piercer
entries: You have achieved a penetrating precision in combat, granting you the following benefits:

items: Un cop per torn, when you hit a creature with an attack that deals piercing damage, you can reroll one of the attack's damage dice, and you must use the new roll.
When you score a critical hit that deals piercing damage to a creature, you can roll one additional damage die when determining the extra piercing damage the target takes.

feat.name: Piercer
entries: You have achieved a penetrating precision in combat, granting you the following benefits:

items: Un cop per torn, when you hit a creature with an attack that deals piercing damage, you can reroll one of the attack's damage dice, and you must use the new roll.
When you score a critical hit that deals piercing damage to a creature, you can roll one additional damage die when determining the extra piercing damage the target takes.

feat.name: Poisoner
entries: You can prepare and deliver deadly poisons, granting you the following benefits:

items: When you make a damage roll that deals poison damage, it ignores resistance to poison damage.
You can apply poison to a weapon or piece of ammunition com a acció bonus, instead of an action.

Tens competència amb the {@item poisoner's kit|phb} if you don't already have it. With one hour of work using a {@item poisoner's kit|phb} and expending 50 gp worth of materials, you can create a number of doses of potent poison equal to your proficiency bonus. Once applied to a weapon or piece of ammunition, the poison retains its potency for 1 minute or until you hit with the weapon or ammunition. When a creature takes damage from the coated weapon or ammunition, that creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitució saving throw or rep {@damage 2d8} de dany de verí and become {@condition emmetzinat} until the end of your next turn.

feat.name: Poisoner
entries: You can prepare and deliver deadly poisons, gaining the following benefits:

items: When you make a damage roll, you ignore resistance to poison damage.
You can coat a weapon in poison com a acció bonus, instead of an action.

Tens competència amb the {@item poisoner's kit|phb} if you don't already have it. With one hour of work using a {@item poisoner's kit|PHB} and expending 50 gp worth of materials, you can create a number of doses of potent poison equal to your proficiency bonus. Once applied, the poison retains potency for 1 minute, or until you hit with the weapon. When a weapon coated in this poison deals damage to a creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitució saving throw or rep {@damage 2d8} de dany de verí and become {@condition emmetzinat} until the end of your next turn.

feat.name: Polearm Master
entries: You can keep your enemies at bay with reach weapons. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Quan prens l'acció {@action Attack} and attack with only a {@item glaive|phb}, {@item halberd|phb}, {@item quarterstaff|phb}, o {@item spear|phb}, pots, com a acció bonus, make a melee attack with the opposite end of the weapon; this attack uses the same ability modifier as the primary attack. The weapon's damage die for this attack is a {@dice d4}, and the attack deals dany contundent.

While you are wielding a {@item glaive|phb}, {@item halberd|phb}, {@item pike|phb}, {@item quarterstaff|phb}, o {@item spear|phb}, other creatures provoke an opportunity attack from you when they enter your reach.

feat.name: Practiced Expert
entries: You have honed your proficiency with particular skills or tools, gaining the following benefits:

items: Tens competència amb unes {@table skills|phb|skill} or {@filter tool|items|type=tool;artisan's tools} of your choice.
Choose one of your skill or tool proficiencies. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses the chosen proficiency.

feat.name: Prodigy
entries: You have a knack for learning new things. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You gain one {@table skills|phb|skill proficiency} of your choice, one {@filter tool proficiency|items|type=tool;artisan's tools} of your choice, and fluency in one language of your choice.

feat.name: Prodigy
entries: You have a knack for learning new things. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You gain one {@table skills|phb|skill proficiency} of your choice, one {@filter tool proficiency|items|type=tool;artisan's tools} of your choice, and fluency in one language of your choice.

Choose one skill in which you have proficiency. You gain expertise with that skill, which means your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make with it. The skill you choose must be one that isn't already benefiting from a feature, such as Expertise, that doubles your proficiency bonus.

feat.name: Quick-Fingered
entries: Your nimble fingers and agility let you perform sleight of hand. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Sleight of Hand}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
Com a acció bonus, you can make una tirada de Destresa ({@skill Joc de Mans}) to plant something on someone else, conceal an object on a creature, lift a purse, or take something from a pocket.

feat.name: Quicksmithing
entries: You have mastered the art of on-the-fly invention, improvement, and jury-rigging. You can use your talents to create immediate, short-term magical effects similar to spells, given time and an adequate supply of aether.

When you choose this feat, you master two magical effects, each of which recreates the effect of a 1st-level spell that has the ritual tag. These spells can come from any class list, but Intel·ligència is your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for them.

If you come across a schematic geared toward quicksmithing or study with another quicksmith, you might be able to add another spell to the effects you have mastered. The spell's level can be no higher than half your level (arrodoneix a l'alta), and it must have the ritual tag. The process of mastering the spell takes 2 hours per level of the spell, and costs 50 gp per level. The cost represents aether you use as you experiment with the spell effect to master it.

In addition, you have proficiency with {@item artisan's tools|PHB} (quicksmith's tools). Using those tools, you can spend 1 hour and 10 gp worth of materials to construct a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5, 1 hp). The device ceases to function after 24 hours unless you spend 1 hour repairing it to keep it functioning. Pots, com a acció, dismantle the device, at which point you can reclaim the materials used to create it. You can have up to three such devices active at a time.
When you create a device, choose one of the following options:

entries.name: Toy de Rellotgeria
entries: This toy is a clockwork animal, monster, or person, such as a frog, mouse, bird, dragon, or soldier. When placed on the ground, the toy moves 5 feet across the ground on each of your turns in a random direction. It makes noises as appropriate to the creature it represents.

entries.name: Fire Starter
entries: This device produces a miniature flame, which you can use to light a candle, torch, or campfire. Using the device requires your action.

entries.name: Music Box
entries: When opened, this music box plays a single song at a moderate volume. The box stops playing when it reaches the song's end or when it is closed.

feat.name: Resilient

choose.entry: Increase the chosen ability score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

entries: Choose one ability score. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You gain proficiency in saving throws using the chosen ability.

feat.name: Revenant Blade
entries: You are descended from a master of the {@item double-bladed simitarra|ERLW}, and some of that mastery has passed on to you. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: While you are holding a double-bladed scimitar with two hands, you gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class.
A double-bladed scimitar has the finesse property when you wield it.

feat.name: Ritual Caster
entries: You have learned a number of spells that you can cast as rituals. These spells are written in a ritual book, which you must have in hand while casting one of them.

When you choose this feat, you acquire a ritual book holding two 1st-level spells of your choice. Choose one of the following classes: {@filter bard|spells|level=1|class=bard|components & miscellaneous=ritual}, {@filter cleric|spells|level=1|class=cleric|components & miscellaneous=ritual}, {@filter druid|spells|level=1|class=druid|components & miscellaneous=ritual}, {@filter sorcerer|spells|level=1|class=sorcerer|components & miscellaneous=ritual}, {@filter warlock|spells|level=1|class=warlock|components & miscellaneous=ritual}, o {@filter wizard|spells|level=1|class=wizard|components & miscellaneous=ritual}. You must choose your spells from that class's spell list, and the spells you choose must have the ritual tag. The class you choose also determines your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for these spells: Carisma for bard, sorcerer, or warlock; Saviesa for cleric or druid; or Intel·ligència for wizard.

If you come across a spell in written form, such as a magical spell scroll or a wizard's spellbook, you might be able to add it to your ritual book. The spell must be on the spell list for the class you chose, the spell's level can be no higher than half your level (arrodoneix a l'alta), and it must have the ritual tag. The process of copying the spell into your ritual book takes 2 hours per level of the spell, and costs 50 gp per level. The cost represents material components you expend as you experiment with the spell to master it, as well as the fine inks you need to record it.

feat.name: Savage Attacker
entries: Un cop per torn when you roll damage for a atac armat cos a cos, you can reroll the weapon's damage dice and use either total.

feat.name: Second Chance
entries: You have a knack for learning new things. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: When a creature you can see hits you with an attack roll, you can use your reaction to force that creature to reroll. Once you use this ability, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: Second Chance
entries: Fortune favors you when someone tries to strike you. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: When a creature you can see hits you with an attack roll, you can use your reaction to force that creature to reroll. Once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you roll initiative at the start of combat or until you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: Sentinel
entries: You have mastered techniques to take advantage of every drop in any enemy's guard, gaining the following benefits:

items: When you hit a creature with an opportunity attack, the creature's speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.
Creatures provoke opportunity attacks from you even if they take the {@action Disengage} action before leaving your reach.

When a creature within 5 feet of you makes an attack against a target other than you (and that target doesn't have this feat), you can use your reaction to make a atac armat cos a cos against the attacking creature.

feat.name: Servo Crafting
entries: You are skilled in the creation of servos—tiny constructs that function as personal assistants. You can cast the {@spell trobar familiar} spell as a ritual, creating a servo to serve as your familiar instead of an animal. A servo's statistics appear in the "Artifact Creatures" section of this document. In every other way, a servo familiar functions as described in the {@spell trobar familiar} spell.
You can communicate telepathically with your servo familiar and perceive through its senses as long as you are on the same plane of existence. You can speak through your servo in your own voice.
Additionally, quan prens l'acció {@action Attack}, you can forgo one of your own attacks to allow your servo familiar to make one attack of its own.

feat.name: Shadow Touched
entries: Your exposure to the Erm de l'Ombra's magic has changed you, granting you the following benefits:

items: You learn the {@spell invisibility} spell and one 1st-level spell of your choice. The {@filter 1st-level spell|spells|level=1|school=I;N} must be from the illusion or necromancy school of magic. You can cast each of these spells without expending a spell slot. Once you cast either of these spells in this way, you can't cast that spell in this way again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spells' habilitat de llançament de conjurs is the ability increased by this feat.

feat.name: Shadow Touched
entries: You learn how to bend shadows from your experience with the Erm de l'Ombra. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You learn the {@spell darkness} spell and one {@filter 1st-level spell|spells|level=1|school=I;N} of your choice. The 1st-level spell must be from the illusion or necromancy school of magic. You can cast each of these spells without expending a spell slot. Once you cast either of these spells in this way, you can't cast that spell in this way again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spells' habilitat de llançament de conjurs is the ability increased by this feat.

feat.name: Tir Precís
entries: You have mastered ranged weapons and can make shots that others find impossible. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on your atac armat a distància rolls.
Your atacs armats a distància ignoren mitja cobertura i cobertura de tres quarts.
Before you make an attack with a ranged weapon that you are proficient with, you can choose to take a -5 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, you add +10 to the attack's damage.

feat.name: Shield Master
entries: You use shields not just for protection but also for offense. Obténs els beneficis següents while you are wielding a {@item shield|phb}:

items: If you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn, pots, com a acció bonus, try to {@action shove} a creature within 5 feet of you with your shield.
If you aren't {@condition incapacitat}, you can add your shield's AC bonus to any Destresa saving throw you make against a spell or other harmful effect that targets only you.

If you are subjected to an effect that allows you salvar per Destresa to take only half damage, you can use your reaction to take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, interposing your shield between yourself and the source of the effect.

feat.name: Shield Training
entries: You've trained in the effective use of shields. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència amb {@item shield|phb|shields}.
In combat, you can don or doff a shield as the free object interaction on your turn.
If you have the Spellcasting or Pact Magic feature, you can use a shield as a spellcasting focus.

feat.name: Silver-Tongued
entries: You develop your conversational skill to better deceive others. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Deception}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

Quan prens l'acció {@action Attack} on your turn, you can replace one attack with an attempt to deceive one humanoid que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast that can see and hear you. Make una tirada de Carisma ({@skill Engany}) contested by the target's Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) check. If your check succeeds, el teu moviment no provoca atacs d'oportunitat from the target and your attack rolls against it have advantage; both benefits last until the end of your next turn or until you use this ability on a different target. If your check fails, the target can't be deceived by you in this way for 1 hour.

feat.name: Skill Expert
entries: You have honed your proficiency with particular skills, granting you the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in one {@table skills|phb|skill} of your choice.

Choose one skill in which you have proficiency. You gain expertise with that skill, which means your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make with it. The skill you choose must be one that isn't already benefiting from a feature, such as Expertise, that doubles your proficiency bonus.

feat.name: Skilled
entries: You gain proficiency in any combination of three {@table skills|phb} or {@filter tools|items|type=tools;artisan's tools;instrument;gaming set;vehicle (land);vehicle (water)} of your choice.

feat.name: Skulker
entries: You are expert at slinking through shadows. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You can try to hide when you are lightly obscured from the creature from which you are hiding.
When you are hidden from a creature and miss it with a atac armat a distància, making the attack doesn't reveal your position.
Dim light doesn't impose disadvantage on your Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks relying on sight.

feat.name: Slasher
entries: You've learned where to cut to have the greatest results, granting you the following benefits:

items: Un cop per torn when you hit a creature with an attack that deals slashing damage, you can reduce the speed of the target by 10 feet fins el final del teu proper torn.
When you score a critical hit that deals slashing damage to a creature, you grievously wound it. Fins el final del teu proper torn, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls.

feat.name: Slasher
entries: You've learned where to cut to have the greatest results, granting you the following benefits:

items: Un cop per torn when you hit a creature with an attack that deals slashing damage, you can reduce the speed of the target by 10 feet fins el final del teu proper torn.
When you score a critical hit that deals slashing damage to a creature, you grievously wound it. Fins el final del teu proper torn, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls.

feat.name: Spear Mastery
entries: Though the {@item spear|phb} is a simple weapon to learn, it rewards you for the time you have taken to master it. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls you make with a spear.

When you use a spear, its damage die changes from a {@dice d6} to a {@dice d8}, and from a {@dice d8} to a {@dice d10} when wielded with two hands. (This benefit has no effect if another feature has already improved the weapon's die.)

You can set your spear to receive a charge. Com a acció bonus, choose a creature you can see that is at least 20 feet away from you. If that creature moves within your spear's reach on its next turn, you can make a melee attack against it with your spear as a reaction. If the attack hits, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany perforant, or an extra {@damage 1d10} de dany perforant if you wield the spear with two hands. You can't use this ability if the creature used the {@action Disengage} action before moving.
Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can increase your reach with a spear by 5 feet for the rest of your turn.

feat.name: Spell Sniper
entries: You have learned techniques to enhance your attacks with certain kinds of spells, gaining the following benefits:

items: When you cast a spell that requires you to make an attack roll, the spell's range is doubled.
Your atacs màgics a distància ignore half cover and three-quarters cover.

You learn one cantrip that requires an attack roll. Choose the cantrip from the {@filter bard|spells|level=0|class=bard|spell attack=m;r;o}, {@filter cleric|spells|level=0|class=cleric|spell attack=m;r;o}, {@filter druid|spells|level=0|class=druid|spell attack=m;r;o}, {@filter sorcerer|spells|level=0|class=sorcerer|spell attack=m;r;o}, {@filter warlock|spells|level=0|class=warlock|spell attack=m;r;o}, o {@filter wizard|spells|level=0|class=wizard|spell attack=m;r;o} spell list. Your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for this cantrip depends on the spell list you chose from: Carisma for bard, sorcerer, or warlock; Saviesa for cleric or druid; or Intel·ligència for wizard.

feat.name: Squat Nimbleness
entries: You are uncommonly nimble for your race. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Increase your walking speed by 5 feet.
You gain proficiency in the {@skill Acrobatics} or {@skill Athletics} skill. If you're already proficient in the skill, your proficiency bonus is doubled for any check you make with it.

feat.name: Squat Nimbleness
entries: You are uncommonly nimble for your race. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Increase your walking speed by 5 feet.
You gain proficiency in the {@skill Acrobatics} or {@skill Athletics} skill (your choice).
You have advantage on any Força ({@skill Atletisme}) or Destresa ({@skill Acrobàcies}) check you make to escape from being {@condition grappled}.

feat.name: Stealthy
entries: You know how best to hide. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Stealth}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
If you are hidden, you can move up to 10 feet in the open without revealing yourself if you end the move in a position where you're not clearly visible.

feat.name: Survivalist
entries: You master wilderness lore, gaining the following benefits:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Survival}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
You learn the {@spell alarm} spell. You can cast it once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Svirfneblin Magic
entries: You have inherited the habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata of your ancestors. This ability allows you to cast {@spell indetectable} on yourself at will, without needing a material component. You can also cast each of the following spells once with this ability: {@spell ceguera/sordera}, {@spell difuminar}, i {@spell ego camuflatge}. You regain the ability to cast these spells when you finish a long rest.
Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència, and you cast them at their lowest possible levels.

feat.name: Tandem Tactician
entries: Your presence in a scrap tends to elevate your comrades. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You can use the {@action Help} action as a bonus action.

When you use the {@action Help} action to aid an ally in attacking a creature, increase the range of the {@action Help} action by 10 feet. Additionally, you can help two allies targeting the same creature within range when you use the {@action Help} action this way.

feat.name: Tavern Brawler
entries: Accustomed to rough-and-tumble fighting using whatever weapons happen to be at hand, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You are proficient with improvised weapons.
Your atac desarmat uses a {@damage d4} for damage.
When you hit a creature with an atac desarmat or an improvised weapon on your turn, pots, com a acció bonus, attempt to grapple the target.

feat.name: Telekinetic
entries: You learn to move things with your mind, granting you the following benefits:

items: You learn the {@spell mà de mag} cantrip. You can cast it without verbal or somatic components, and you can make the spectral hand {@condition invisible}. If you already know this spell, its range increases by 30 feet when you cast it. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs is the ability increased by this feat.

Com a acció bonus, you can try to telekinetically shove una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. When you do so, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier of the score increased by this feat) or be moved 5 feet toward you or away from you. A creature can willingly fail this save.

feat.name: Telekinetic
entries: You learn to move things with your mind. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You learn the {@spell mà de mag} cantrip. You can cast it without verbal or somatic components, and you can make the spectral hand {@condition invisible}. If you already know this spell, its range increases by 30 feet when you cast it. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs is the ability increased by this feat.

Com a acció bonus, you can try to telekinetically shove una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. When you do so, roll your Psionic Talent die, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier of the score increased by this feat) or be moved toward you or away from you a number of feet equal to 5 times the number you rolled. A creature can willingly fail this save.

feat.name: Telekinetic
entries: You learn to move things with your mind. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You learn the {@spell mà de mag} cantrip. You can cast it without verbal or somatic components, and you can make the spectral hand invisible.

Com a acció bonus, you can try to shove one creature you can see within 5 feet of the spectral hand created by your {@spell mà de mag} spell. When you do so, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + el teu modificador de Intel·ligència) or be pushed 5 feet away from you.

feat.name: Telepathic
entries: You awaken the ability to mentally connect with others, granting you the following benefits:

items: You can speak telepathically to any creature que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Your telepathic utterances are in a language you know, and the creature understands you only if it knows that language. Your communication doesn't give the creature the ability to respond to you telepathically.

You can cast the {@spell detectar pensaments} spell, requiring no spell slot or components, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast it this way again. Your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for the spell is the ability increased by this feat. If you have spell slots of 2nd level or higher, you can cast this spell with them.

feat.name: Telepathic
entries: You awaken the ability to mentally connect with others. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You can speak telepathically to any creature que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. Your telepathic utterances are in a language you know, and the creature understands you only if it knows that language. Your communication doesn't give the creature the ability to respond to you telepathically.

If your Psionic Talent die is available, you can cast the {@spell detectar pensaments} spell, sense requerir components. When you start casting the spell, your Psionic Talent die decreases by one die size. Your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for the spell is the ability increased by this feat.

feat.name: Telepathic
entries: You awaken the ability to mentally connect with others. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice from the following list: {@skill Deception}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Intimidation}, o {@skill Persuasion}.
You can communicate telepathically with any creature que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. If it understands at least one language, it can respond to you telepathically.

feat.name: Theologian

1: detectar el bé i el mal

entries: Your extensive study of religion rewards you with the following benefits:

items: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Religion}. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

You learn the {@spell taumatúrgia} and {@spell detectar el bé i el mal} spells. You can cast {@spell detectar el bé i el mal} once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Tough
entries: Your punts de vida màxims increases by an amount equal to twice your level when you gain this feat. Whenever you gain a level thereafter, your punts de vida màxims increases by an additional 2 hit points.

feat.name: Tower of Iron Will
entries: Your mind's defenses are formidable. After you or another creature que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast fails a saving throw, you can use your reaction to roll your Psionic Talent die and add the number rolled to the saving throw, potentially causing it to succeed.

feat.name: Tracker
entries: You have spent time hunting creatures and honed your skills, gaining the following benefits:

items: You learn the {@spell marca de caça} spell. You can cast it once without expending a spell slot, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast it in this way again. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have. Saviesa is your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for this spell.
You have advantage on Saviesa ({@skill Supervivència}) checks to track creatures

feat.name: Vampiric Exultation
entries: Com a acció, you can transform the lower half of your body into an inky black vapor, allowing you to float through the air. While transformed, tens una velocitat de vol de 30 peus. You can maintain this form for up to 10 minutes. Un cop empris aquesta dot, has d'acabar un Descans Curt o bé Llarg per a tornar a emprar-lo.

feat.name: War Caster
entries: You have practiced casting spells in the midst of combat, learning techniques that grant you the following benefits:

items: You have advantage on Constitució saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell when you take damage.
You can perform the somatic components of spells even when you have weapons or a {@item shield|phb} in one or both hands.

When a hostile creature's movement provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can use your reaction to cast a spell at the creature, rather than making an opportunity attack. The spell must have a casting time of 1 action and must target only that creature.

feat.name: Warhammer Master
entries: {@note This feat is presented as an illustrative example of a poorly-designed feat, and is not intended to be used in play. The {@feat Fell Handed|UAFeats} feat is presented as a well-designed implementation of the same ideas, and should be used instead.}
When you hit a creature with a {@item warhammer|phb}, the  creature must succeed on a Força saving  throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your  Força modifier) or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

In addition, you can use your warhammer to  knock away a foe's shield. If you hit a creature  that's using a shield, you can have the attack deal  no damage and force the creature to drop its  shield.

feat.name: Weapon Master
entries: You have practiced extensively with a variety of weapons, gaining the following benefits:

items: Tens competència amb four weapons of your choice. Each one must be a simple or a martial weapon.

feat.name: Wild Talent
entries: You awaken to your psionic potential, which enhances your mind or body. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 20, to represent this enhancement.

You also harbor a wellspring of psionic power within yourself, an energy that ebbs and flows as you channel it in various ways. This power is represented by your Psionic Talent die, the starting size of which is a {@dice d6}.

entries.name: Psionic Talent Options
entries: You can use your Psionic Talent die in the following ways:

items.name: Psi-Boosted Ability.
items.entry: When you make an ability check with the ability increased by this feat, you can roll your Psionic Talent die and add the number rolled to the check. You can choose to do so before or after rolling the {@dice d20}, but before you know whether the check succeeded or failed.

items.name: Psi-Guided Strike.
items.entry: Once on each of your turns when you hit with an attack roll that uses the ability increased by this feat, you can roll your Psionic Talent die after you make the damage roll and then replace one of the damage dice with the number rolled on the Psionic Talent die.

entries.name: Changing the Die's Size
entries: If you roll the highest number on your Psionic Talent die, it decreases by one die size after the roll. This represents you burning through your psionic energy. For example, if the die is a {@dice d6} and you roll a 6, it becomes a {@dice d4}. If it's a {@dice d4} and you roll a 4, it becomes unusable until you finish a long rest.

Conversely, if you roll a 1 on your Psionic Talent die, it increases by one die size after the roll, up to its starting size. This represents you conserving psionic energy for later use. For example, if you roll a 1 on a {@dice d4}, the die then becomes a {@dice d6}.

Whenever you finish a long rest, your Psionic Talent die resets to its starting size. When you reach certain levels, the starting size of your Psionic Talent die increases: at 5th level ({@dice d8}), 11th level ({@dice d10}), and 17th level ({@dice d12}). If you have a Psionic Talent die from another source, such as a class feature, you don't get more than one die; use only the one with the largest starting size.

entries.name: Psi Replenishment
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can calm your mind for a moment and restore your Psionic Talent die to its starting size. You then can't use Psi Replenishment again until you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Wonder Maker
entries: You master the tinker techniques of your people. Obténs els beneficis següents:

items: When you make a check using your proficiency with {@item tinker's tools|phb}, you add double your proficiency bonus to the check.
When you make a device with your Tinker trait, you have the following additional options for what you make:

items.name: Alarma
entries: This device senses when a creature moves to within 15 feet of it without speaking aloud a password chosen when you create it. One round after a creature moves into range, the alarm makes a shrill ringing that lasts for 1 minute and can be heard from up to 300 feet away.

items.name: Calculator
entries: This device makes doing sums easy.

items.name: Lifter
entries: This device can be used as a block and tackle, allowing its user to hoist five times the weight the user can normally lift.

items.name: Timekeeper
entries: This pocket watch keeps accurate time.

items.name: Weather Sensor
entries: When used com a acció, this device predicts weather conditions in a 1-mile radius over the next 4 hours, showing one symbol (clouds, sun/moon, rain, or snow) for each hour.

feat.name: Wood Elf Magic
entries: You learn the magic of the primeval woods. You learn one druid cantrip of your choice. You also learn {@spell llarg de gambals} and {@spell passar desapercebudament}, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast the spell in this way when you finish a long rest. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa.

feat.name: Wood Elf Magic
entries: You learn the magic of the primeval woods, which are revered and protected by your people. You learn one druid cantrip of your choice. You also learn the {@spell llarg de gambals} and {@spell passar desapercebudament} spells, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast these two spells in this way when you finish a long rest. Saviesa is your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for all three spells.
